# wiperMotorPlatform
based on 2 wiper motors, NRF24 and a VNH2SP30 motor driver based arduino shield

![](https://i.imgur.com/jb0e2Xa.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/SxAtMcw.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/LzyucU1.png)
